Html:
Hello!

In my project I use .xlsx template to fill it with values. Values filling is good, but document receives a strange change of view (border outlines are missing and other borders becomes green, white text becomes red).
I don't have any lines in my code that changes the style and border colour of document.

My template:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/gj1nrv5fupllcmu/flight_task_template.xlsx?dl=0

Final result (after filling):
https://www.dropbox.com/s/q2pvflm13470jta/final.xlsx?dl=0

What could be the reason?
